name: Bangalore Free Illustration Set (Community) (Community)
description:
About Bangalore (open-source)

This airy and abstract style is minimal and elegant. It's super easy to adapt to your branding or projects as it uses only two colors.


Included Features

  1. Customizable strokes and colors
  2. Free Figma plugin that allows for instant search, magic resize, and drag and drop capabilities.
  3. Free global color editor to swap colors in 1 click via our web app.
  4. Bangalore Pro with 100+ premium illustrations, should you need more.
  5. All 25,000+ illustrations at Streamline are free as PNGs.
